column4: Hi, excuse me. My ubuntu 10.10 64bit most of the times can't browse the internet, can't download updates but is getting a network connection to ISP, settings are default from install, DHCP, not PPPOE, no routers, connected straight to DSL modem. The MS Windows is working. I tried deleting old network settings and adding new one, again connected to ISP but still cant use internet. Can someone
ok TY will do, I'll try as well the live 32bit and see what happens
